attributes.action: Reduce by 50% the amount of Council Tax that married pensioners have to pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In september,my wife and I will be entitled to our Old Aged Pension a combined amount of about £600 per month.Our council tax bill will be about £120 per month. 20% of our combined pensions.
If we then add £60 per month heating and light and £25 water rates,one third of our combined pensions will have disappeared before we start buying that other essential commodity, food.
